titles.title: SCREENS for Cancer Act of 2025
Screening for Communities to Receive Early and Equitable Needed Services for Cancer Act of 2025
SCREENS for Cancer Act of 2025
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize and improve the National Breast and Cervical Cancer Early Detection Program for fiscal years 2026 through 2030, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
